page.title: 01OUR AREA.
page.content: I LIVE IN {CARLTON MINIOTT}IN A STREET CALLED CONISTON WAY.I GO TO {SCHOOL} EVERY DAY EXCEPT FOR SATURDAY AND SUNDAY.QUITE A LOT OF PEOPLE LIVE NEAR ME AND PLAY WITH ME.CARLTON MINIOTT IS QUITE A SMALL VILLAGE WITH ONLY ONE SHOP.I LIKE IT WHERE I LIVE BECAUSE THE HOUSES ARE JUST THE RIGHT SIZE FOR US.THERE ARE SOME VERY FRIENDLY PEOPLE IN OUR AREA.THERE ARE SOME FARMS IN THIS AREA.THERE ARE A MIXTURE OF HOUSES.THERE IS A PRIMARY SCHOOL IN THE AREA AND I GO TO IT.IT IS CALLED CARLTON MINIOTT COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL.THIS YEAR THERE ARE 112 CHILDREN IN OUR SCHOOL.
